Getting Here is Easy!

High Street Centre is centrally located and easily accessible via public transport. We're just a short walk from both Clarke Quay and City Hall MRT stations.

Financial Perspectives is Singapore's premier financial education provider. Since 1999, we've pioneered excellence in CFP¬Æ certification and professional development for financial advisors.
